LanguageData.RC2_Gin.label: gin
LanguageData.RC2_Gin.description: Gin is actually a distilled drink made from the flavoring of a base alcohol, usually vodka, with Juniper berries. It is mostly found in northern climates, where Juniper berries can be easily grown or gathered.
